A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 18, 2010''' at 00:16 UTC<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(19:13:29) <Compo> Hey Notch, when's 3rd person due?"..."(19:18:14) <Notch> reload, play, press f5!"</ref>. It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Indev 20100218-0011|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 00:19 UTC<ref>[[wordofnotch:395558219|Armor is out, and third person view]] – The Word of Notch, February 18, 2010</ref>.
